docs.lead_paragraph: A GOOD plan for amusing a group of growing boys for whom the usual parlor games are apt to be too slow was discovered by a woman of ideas who found herself face to face with the problem of a social afternoon with the boys of her Sunday school class.

headline.main: WHAT EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW; Woman of Ideas Discovers a Successful Way to Entertain Growing Boys for Whom Ordinary Parlor Games Are Too Slow.

docs.snippet: A GOOD plan for amusing a group of growing boys for whom the usual parlor games are apt to be too slow was discovered by a woman of ideas who found herself face to face with the problem of a social afternoon with the boys of her Sunday school class.

docs.lead_paragraph: Four of the survivors from the Titanic disaster went to the Hotel Imperial. They were Mrs. L.A. Hippach and her daughter, Miss Jean Hippach, of Chicago; J.J. Flynn of Philadelphia, and A.H. Blackworth, a young Englishman from London, who embarked on the Titanic for his first trip to America.

headline.main: CLUNG TILL DAWN TO OVERTURNED BOAT; Young Englishman and a Dozen Other Men Picked Up Nearly Frozen.
